name: Where is (Tommaso Faraci)
description:
Where is is a multiplayer PvP game in which the first to reach 15 points wins. Whoever starts the game will be the one who will check the cups and decide the object to hide under them. The opponent will have to guess under which cup the object is hidden or which object is hidden.
Where is does not have a matchmaking system: to play you will need to enter a match code which will be generated randomly when starting a new game, so you will not be able to play against random players.
